name: New Frontier Days ~Founding Pioneers~
description: "New Frontier Days ~Founding Pioneers~" is a town-building simulation game, where you command your pioneers to colonize a new land.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / Windows 10 Processor: Intel Pentium G3220 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core-i3 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
